title: Creating tables
description: Learn how to create tables from the SDK.

frontMatter.title: Creating tables
frontMatter.description: Learn how to create tables from the SDK.
frontMatter.synopsis: All tables are created through on-chain actions that create a table (ERC721 token). The SDK abstracts this from the developer's point of view, but it's important to understand this context for why a chain connection is required for table creation.
